hooks.command:
if [ -f .ai-workspace/STATE.md ]; then cat .ai-workspace/STATE.md; else echo '## AI Dev Team Ready

No workspace initialized. Run /start-project to begin.

Commands: /start-project, /new-feature, /design, /implement, /test, /review, /status'; fi

hooks.prompt:
Before writing code, verify these production standards:

1. TYPE HINTS: All function signatures annotated
2. ASYNC: I/O operations use async def
3. ERRORS: Domain exceptions used (not bare except)
4. LOGGING: structlog used (not print)
5. VALIDATION: Pydantic schemas for API input
6. SECRETS: No hardcoded values
7. NAMING: Follows conventions (snake_case for Python, camelCase for TS)

If writing to .ai-workspace/ (docs, state, tasks), skip these checks.
If writing source code and any standard is violated, suggest the corrected version.
Only BLOCK if there's a critical security issue (hardcoded secret, SQL injection).
